H0.text: Which is the largest island off the west coast of North America. Vancouver Island

H1.text: Which is the largest island off the west coast of North America. Baffin Island

H2.text: Which is the largest island off the west coast of North America. Haida Gwaii

H3.text: Which is the largest island off the west coast of North America. CIVI

A4.text: Vancouver Island is the largest by area and the most populous along the west coasts of the Americas.
